name: @shared-utils/test-consumer
description: Integration tests and real-world usage examples for shared-utils

scripts.build:server: echo 'Server tests - no build step required'
scripts.test:all: yarn test:react || true && yarn test:node || true && yarn test:vanilla || true && yarn test:server
scripts.kill:vite: pkill -f vite || echo 'No Vite processes found'
scripts.kill:react: pkill -f 'vite.*react-app' || echo 'No React dev server found'
scripts.kill:all: pkill -f 'node.*index.js' && pkill -f vite || echo 'Killed all test consumer processes'
